handoff_data.summary: Comprehensive destination analysis for Thailand autumn 2025 completed for Kupibilet audience: travelers 25-45 and families.
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use all four analytical blocks and actionable insights for creating a warm, inspirational, conversion-focused email campaign. Accent on autumn advantages and family offers.
